summary: Created comprehensive model metadata schema as single source of truth for all inference providers and their models

context.problem: Model catalog scattered across 6+ config files with no central schema, making updates error-prone and deprecations difficult to track
context.solution: Created opencode-config/models/schema.json with comprehensive metadata for 7 providers and 31 models
context.impact: Provides single source of truth for model validation, dashboard UI, weekly sync tasks, and migration paths

changes.description: Comprehensive model metadata schema with provider definitions and model catalog

providers_documented: openai (gpt-4o, gpt-4o-mini, o1, plus 3 deprecated gpt-5* models)
google (gemini-2.5-pro, gemini-2.5-flash, plus 2 deprecated gemini-3* models)
metadata_fields: capabilities (text, vision, audio, video, reasoning, thinking, code)

notes: Schema serves as foundation for weekly model sync task, validate-models.mjs enhancements, and dashboard model catalog UI
